knimeNode.name: ProteinPilot XML Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node reads ProteinPilot-produced XML files, produced from group2xml.exe. This program is part of AB SCIEX' ProteinPilot from release version 3

fullDescription.intro: This node reads ProteinPilot-produced XML files, produced from group2xml.exe. This program (group2xml.exe) is part of AB SCIEX' ProteinPilot from release version 3.

ports.outPort: Identified peptides from ProteinPilot .group file (converted to XML)
Based on identified peptides, this port reports identified proteins as computed by ProteinPilot
Quantitation results at MS/MS spectrum level. Only iTRAQ is currently supported.
